artist: Decorator: Alec Burns; Manufacturer: Linthorpe Art Pottery, Middlesbrough, Yorkshire, England, 1879-1889
creditline: The Mrs. Ethelyn Bros Purchase Fund
description: dark green bowl with turquoise interior; dark green cover with central floral openwork design surrounded by openwork circles and teardrop shapes; yellow on bottom of cover
inscription: \"AB [intertwined]\", incised, on bottom of cover; \"LINTHORPE/HT [intertwined]\", incised, on bottom of bowl
title: Potpourri bowl
